document_data.mainbody:
racker Rindle was a member of the Cult of the Absolute who served as a lookout at a fortress near the Shattered Sanctum.
Rindle had sickly yellow-green skin. She wore mismatcher leather rags accented with a feathered hood.
She carried with her a crude bow crafted from wood and bone.
In the , the Cult of the Absolute launched a successful raid agains the Waukeens Rest inn, situated along the Risen Road. Unfortunately for Rindle and a handful of other goblins, they were forced to carry out guard duty at a nearby outpost, rather than join in the full celebrations.
